title: Saving Their Wolf
description: A wolf shifter haunted by her past. Three men who only want her happiness. Will their love be enough to save her?Catherine Malraux has returned to her hometown of Paris after the mysterious death of her ex-boyfriend. She wants to forget the ordeal, as well as the growing shifter hatred she left behind. Her best-friend-turned-boyfriend is moving to Paris with her, and she can’t wait to see how their relationship develops.But fate has other ideas. When she meets two new sexy men—Martin, an elephant shifter, and Reid, a wolf shifter—the intense attraction has her reeling. After Catherine has refused lust and affection for so long, three hot men want to love her.Can Catherine accept that she deserves love before an enemy from the past takes her life?
author: Tori Knightwood
